entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Richmond
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:14 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vancouver Int'l Airport 2:39 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 6.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 6.5°C
Wind: ESE 22 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h except 40 near the Strait of Georgia late in the morning and in the afternoon. High 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
